keyPolicies.policyDescription: Putting Eastleigh and the villages first and securing a better deal for us all, making sure our local community is really thriving.
Fighting for improved infrastructure, community facilities and tackling the crippling traffic congestion affecting our quality of life.
Housing for the next generation but protecting our countryside with more brownfield development and fairer planning.

issues.economy: Stop Eastleigh becoming a ghost town, make shopping more diverse & vibrant with cheaper car parking
issues.education: Getting local education, job opportunities & community support right in Eastleigh & the villages
issues.environment: Housing the next generation but the community heard and our green spaces preserved
issues.health: Protecting and improving NHS and community facilities for our better health and well-being

housing.content: Housing the next generation but the community heard and our green spaces preserved

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Judy Jamieson, on behalf of Mims Davies, both at Eastleigh Conservatives, The Hill, Upper Northam Close, Hedge End, Southampton, SO30 4BB.

images.caption: Mims with Chancellor George Osborne in Botley, at Eastleigh College with Rt. Hon Iain Duncan Smith MP & Education Secretary Nicky Morgan MP
